Sentencas: The mechanical failure of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) components may cause cracks with consequences such as gas leakage, structure instability and reduction of cell lifetime.

Sentencas: A comprehensive 3D model of the thermal stresses of an anode-supported planar SOFC is presented in this work.

Sentencas: The main objective of this paper is to get an interconnect optimized design by evaluating the thermal stresses of an anode-supported SOFC for different designs, which would be a new criterion for interconnect design.

Sentencas: The model incorporates the momentum, mass, heat, ion and electron transport, as well as steady-state mechanics.

Sentencas: A wider interconnect of the anode side lowers the stress obviously.
